name: recipe-recommendation-platform
description: 🍽️ Full-stack recipe recommendation platform with AI ingredient detection, personalized suggestions, dietary filtering, and smart shopping lists

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ml-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
